comment.author: 41399322@N07
comment._content:
This is the Labna's door, El Arco de Labná, at Uxmal.
Is not aztec, is Mayan.
This archeological site of Uxmal, at Yucatan, is a perfect example of the mayan architecture of the post-clasic period (Puuc).
The mayan civilisation shows in this door an important architectural technique they discovered and used a lot, the mayan arch.
A perfect place to visit and explore.
